author: foxnews.com
title: John Gibson: Alan Colmes was Really Good at this Gig | Featured 4
text: FOX News Radio's Alan Colmes has passed away at age 66 after a brief illness. His radio mate, John Gibson remembered him during the opening of his show with some of his favorite moments: Colmes leaves behind his wife, Jocelyn Crowley, who issued the following statement: Alan Colmes passed away
